bioimg.base.plot_channels¶

bioimg.base.plot_channels(images, nrow, ncol, titles=None, scale_x=4, scale_y=4, cmap=None)¶
Parameters
imageslist

List of np.array (image arrays). Ararys can be either greyscale or color 2D images

nrowint

Number of rows

ncolint

Numbr of columns

titleslist or array

List-like, plot subtitles

scale_xint

Figure width parameter: w = scale_x * ncol

scale_yint

Figure height parameter: h = scale_y * nrow

cmapstring

Name of the matplotlib colormap. Default to viridis

Previous topic

bioimg.base.write_imgstack

Next topic

bioimg.base.combine_channels
